content:
The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported the loss of Russians in the last day, as well as their total losses since the beginning of a large -scale invasion.

DataMadeThe General Staff of the Armed Forces in the morning of March 19.

The losses of the Russians make up:

  • personnel - 432390 (+840) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6819 (+10)
  • combat armored vehicles - 13049 (+35)
  • artillery systems - 10698 (+30)
  • RSWW - 1017 (0)
  • air defense facilities - 721 (1)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8318 (+10)
  • Winged missiles - 1922 (0)
  • ships / boats - 26 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14191 (+50)
  • Special equipment - 1735 (+4).

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!
title: 10 tanks, 30 artisystems and 35 BBM: RF loss per day
description: The data was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces on the morning of March 19. The losses of Russians make up: ...
author: Army Inform
